sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
He is part of the [[House Lannister|Lannister]] army in [[the Riverlands]] and delivers news of the movements of the [[House Stark|Stark]] army to [[Tywin Lannister]].<ref>"[[The Pointy End]]"</ref>
